Published in three volumes, this is a series of 25 interviews, an extensive glossary of terms dealing with the aesthetics of sound, audio technologies, and musical genres; as well as institutional monographs and biographies. The books will also contain very rich visual documentation in the form of facsimiles and other images, as well as three downloadable compilations of music. This project, made up of detailed research and interviews done over the last five years, brings together the testimonies of composers, DJs, sound engineers, electronic music producers and sound artists, with the aim of creating an intersection of ideas about the transformations in the cultural and artistic identity in Mexico, within the amorphous territory of sound and technology.  In this collection the reader will find a series of conversations with a very diverse group of artists, from the creators of the Nortec movement, to the pioneers of radio, to electro-acoustic composers who have driven experimentation within academic circles, to the first auto-didactics who have interlaced and mixed musical genres, to DJs who have shaped the vast experience of electronic dance music, and the most recent attempts that sound art has made to translate our ways of experiencing the world.

 
ARTISTS AND MUSICIANS IN THE COLLECTION :
VOLUME 1. Antonio Russek · Roberto Morales Manzanares · (Bostich) Ramón Amescua · Mario de Vega · Walter Schmidt · (Murcof) Fernando Corona Murillo · Rodolfo Sánchez Alvarado· Manuel Rocha Iturbide · Héctor Quintanar.
VOLUME 2. Rodrigo Sigal · Plug (Cristian Cárdenas) · Álvaro Ruiz · Rogelio Sosa · DJ Chrysler (Luis Carlos Gómez) · Fax (Rubén Alonso Tamayo) · Gonzalo Macías ·Gabriela Ortíz.
VOLUME 3. Duopandamix · Ángel Sánchez Borges · Angélica Castelló · Guillermo Galindo · Israel Martínez · Javier Álvarez · Manrico Montero · Pepe Mogt
 
 ^/  WHERE WE ARE AT AND WHY WE NEED FUNDING 

This project has been funded so far by a grant from the FONCA (National Cultural Fund) with in-kind services and institutional support.  We are ready to go to print!  And we need your help to make it through the last stretch.
Opting for collaborations with independent artists (photographer, designer, publisher) in order to keep the most freedom in terms of content, the formal aspects of the collection also reflect the ideas and methods of those artists and musicians that the book is about.  We have organized the project (the conversations with the 25 artists, the archival material and the extensive glossary) into 3 volumes, which will be released one after the other… but we need to reach our funding goal to avoid any delays!
As we write this, the editorial team at Deleátur is copy-editing, and the graphic design team is conforming the text, preparing each volume to go to the printers.  Now, we just need to complete our finances to be able to print in the highest quality and most environmentally sound materials, while staying true to our aesthetic and the quality we strive for.
All of the 25 artists have been incredible collaborators and one of the main goals of the book is to bring them more to the public eye, in Mexico and abroad.  We already have plans to translate the book into English, but all of this depends on the way we can accomplish this first release.
With your help, we can go to print on the three volumes, prepare our promotional campaign, and organize the special events and concerts that are already being planned and scheduled.  In fact, we have a release date of mid-May, with a whole series of events already planned from then until December 2013, in collaboration with important music festivals, art centers, and book fairs.  From Mexico City, to Monterrey, to Tijuana, to New York… it is all in our calendar… All we need now is to get the book and all the promotional materials (posters, flyers, etc) made and ready for release.  
Please help with any size contributions, and PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD!!
 
 
^/  WHO ARE WE ?
AUTHOR : Carlos Prieto Acevedo (b. 1973, Mexico City)   Carlos studied in the Philosophy Department at the Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM) and has specialized his work and research in Aesthetic Theory. He has worked in music and art criticism and journalism, writing for magazines, fanzines, and other publications since 1995. He was artistic programmer and producer for festivals and events revolving around electronic music, most notably MUTEK-Mexico, where he worked from 2003 to 2008. Since 2009, Carlos writes the program notes and texts for the experimental music festivals, RADAR and AURAL in Mexico City. In 2008 he was artistic director of a public art project called Peatonal, Encounters with Art and Politics, under the auspices of the Mexico City government. Carlos also produces radio programs, mostly with RADIO UNAM, where his last program was “1978: The year we lived in fear”. In 2012, Carlos was invited to produce a series of sound pieces to install in the 20th Century halls of the MUNAL (Museum of National Art) as part of a curated program called “Contemporary Dialogues”. This series of sound art pieces that he made were called “Sonoral Intermitencies of Modernity” and were installed along side pieces by José Clemente Orozco, Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera among other painters. For the last few years, Carlos has been researching and writing the book project, VOLTAGE VARIATIONS, which are compiled of dialogues with 25 Mexican electronic musicians, old and young. The book, made up of three volumes, will be released in May and October 2013, accompained by a series of concerts. The book was developed with the support of the FONCA. Since 2009, Carlos is a full time professor at the Universidad del Claustro de Sor Juana, where he teaches a seminar on the philosophy of communication. /
http://interregno.org     http://radiogramas.org    http://radio1978.org/
 
PHOTOGRAPHER : Luis Mendez (b. 1976, Mexico)  Freelance photographer at 82Photo / http://www.ochentaydos.com
GRAPHIC DESIGNER : Laura Balboa (b. 1979, Mexico)   She studied in visual arts at the School of Painting, Sculpture and Engraving "La Esmeralda" of the National Center for the Arts in Mexico and graphic design at the School of Higher Studies Acatlán affiliated to the National Autonomous University of Mexico.  Some of her teaching practices include: design and technology workshops for children, graphic design and communication strategies for artists and designers, workshops to understand our relation to technology and objects of everyday life and visual arts activities for mentally ill inmates.  /  http://www.laurabalboa.com
DELEATUR ESTUDIO / Publishing services :  Deleátur is an independent studio specializing in editorial services and consulting that promote and develop the investigation, professional training and the creativity in publishing. / http://www.deleatur.com.mx
 

 
_________
VARIACIÓN DE VOLTAJE
Conversaciones con artistas sonoros y músicos electrónicos mexicanos
 Un proyecto de Carlos Prieto Acevedo
 
VARIACIÓN DE VOLTAJE es un proyecto enciclopédico de divulgación e interpretación crítica del arte sonoro y la música electrónica y electroacústica mexicana.  Editado en 3 tomos, está conformado por 25 entrevistas, un extenso glosario de términos sobre estética del sonido, tecnología de audio, géneros musicales, monografías institucionales y biografías. Incluye también una rica documentación facsimilar y gráfica, así como tres discos descargables de audio. El proyecto, realizado mediante una investigación documental y entrevistas con diversos creadores mexicanos a lo largo de 5 años, incorpora los testimonios de compositores, DJ's, ingenieros de audio, productores de música electrónica y artistas sonoros, con la intención de integrar en un documento el paisaje de alteraciones a la identidad artística y cultural mexicana desde el territorio amorfo de la tecnología y el sonido.  En este compendio se ponen a disposición del lector una serie de conversaciones con artistas tan diversos como los creadores del movimiento Nortec, los pioneros de la radio, los compositores electroacústicos que impulsaron la experimentación desde los espacios académicos, los primeros autodidactas en cruzar y entrelazar categorías y géneros musicales, los DJ's que forjaron la experiencia masiva de la electrónica de baile, hasta las tentativas más recientes del arte sonoro por desbordar nuestras formas de experimentar el mundo.
 
ARTISTAS Y MUSICOS EN LA COLECCIÓN  :
VOLUMEN 1. Antonio Russek · Roberto Morales Manzanares · (Bostich) Ramón Amescua · Mario de Vega · Walter Schmidt · (Murcof) Fernando Corona Murillo · Rodolfo Sánchez Alvarado· Manuel Rocha Iturbide · Héctor Quintanar.
VOLUMEN 2. Rodrigo Sigal · Plug (Cristian Cárdenas) · Álvaro Ruiz · Rogelio Sosa · DJ Chrysler (Luis Carlos Gómez) · Fax (Rubén Alonso Tamayo) · Gonzalo Macías ·Gabriela Ortíz.
VOLUMEN 3. Duopandamix · Ángel Sánchez Borges · Angélica Castelló · Guillermo Galindo · Israel Martínez · Javier Álvarez · Manrico Montero · Pepe Mogt
 

 
^/  ¿ DÓNDE NOS ENCONTRAMOS Y PORQUÉ NECESITAMOS TU AYUDA?
Este proyecto fue auspiciado en un inicio, cuando era muchísimo más pequeño y sencillo, por el programa de co-inversiones del FONCA, y se ha continuado (y ampliado gigantescamente) gracias al respaldo de otras instituciones, iniciativas independientes, y fundamentalmente a la generosidad de muchos individuos. ¡Estamos listos para entrar a la imprenta! Justo por eso necesitamos tu apoyo para finalizar la etapa de producción, ese último paso indispensable para que el proyecto llegue a las manos de todos los que han hecho de la electricidad y el sonido parte de su vida, o a los que se interesan acercarse a este fenómeno del arte sonoro y la música electrónica.
La colaboración y el trabajo de artistas independientes en el proyecto (los editores, el fotógrafo, la artista gráfica), nos permitió mantener una gran libertad en términos de contenido y en la forma en que se organiza la información y la rica documentación. Ya que los aspectos formales de la colección y de cada uno de los libros reproduce de alguna manera los métodos e ideas de los propios artistas sonoros y músicos de los que trata el proyecto. Consta de 25 amplias conversaciones, un abundante material facsimilar y gráfico, y un extenso glosario, ha sido organizado en 3 volúmenes que saldrán consecutivamente uno después del otro durante el año... ¡pero aún necesitamos alcanzar nuestro monto a recaudar para evitar cualquier retraso!
Mientras tú lees esto, el equipo editorial del estudio Deleátur está preparando cada volumen para entrara a impresión: revisando minuciosamente cada una de las páginas y formando en un extraordinario diseño editorial el inmenso contendido; y la diseñadora está retocando los materiales gráficos. Sólo necesitamos completar nuestros presupuestos de producción y garantizar con ello la más alta calidad en los materiales y procesos de impresión y en las plataformas digitales en línea de donde podrás descargar las antologías de música que acompañan éste titánico compendio.
Los 25 creadores han sido increíblemente generosos con el proyecto, y uno de los principales objetivos es darle una mayor visibilidad a su trabajo en México y en el contexto internacional. Incluso ya se tiene planeada su traducción al inglés, pero todo depende de la manera en que logremos imprimir el primero.
Con tu apoyo y aportaciones podremos entrar a la imprenta con los 3 volúmenes, preparar nuestra campaña promocional y la gira de presentaciones, conciertos y eventos especiales que incluso ya están en la agenda y que realizaremos en colaboración con importantes festivales, ferias y centros artísticos. Nuestra fecha oficial de presentación ya está programada para la segunda semana de mayo, con un evento fuera de serie en el festival Aural; y continuamos hasta diciembre con más actividades y descargas sonoras, electrizando el año entero. Desde el Distrito Federal hasta Monterrey, Tijuana, Guadalajara y Nueva York ¡ya está todo calendarizado! lo único que nos falta es imprimir el libro y los materiales de promoción (carteles, programas de mano, fyers etcétera), ¡y tenerlos listos para su lanzamiento!
Ayúdanos con cualquier tipo de contribución, no importa el tamaño... Y POR FAVOR ¡DIFUNDELO! 
 
 ^/   ¿ QUIENES SOMOS ?
AUTOR : Carlos Prieto Acevedo (cd. de México, 1973)  Cursó estudios de licenciatura en filosofía en la FFYL de la UNAM, concentrando sus intereses en la teoría estética. Incursiona en el periodismo y la crítica musical en suplementos, revistas, fanzines y fundando publicaciones desde 1995 hasta la fecha. Fue programador artístico, director de información y productor de eventos, festivales y encuentros relacionados con la música electrónica en México desde fines de los años 90, entre ellos MUTEK - México durante el período 2003-2008. Ha dedicado parte de su trabajo filosófico a investigar la relación entre el sonido y lo social, y en las posibilidades del medio radiofónico creando proyectos digitales y analógicos, series documentales, e incluso tentativas de señal analógica para radios comunitarias. Desde 2009 colabora en la redacción de los programas de mano de electrónica experimental del festival Radar y luego en Aural. En 2008 fue director artístico del proyecto de arte público Peatonal, Encuentros de Arte y Política, auspiciado por el GDF. Produjo en 2010 la serie radiofónica "1978, el año que vivimos en peligro", transmitida por Radio UNAM. Realizó en 2012 la intervención sonora para la sala siglo XX del Museo Nacional de Arte, Intermitencias Sonoras de la Modernidad, en el marco Diálogos Contemporáneos. Actualmente prepara un ciclo de conciertos que acompañará la presentación de su trabajo de investigación "Variación de Voltaje", un compendio en 3 tomos sobre la historia de la música electrónica y electroacústica mexicana, que realiza desde 2008 gracias a una beca del FONCA, y que se lanzará este año. Desde 2009 es profesor de tiempo completo en la Universidad del Claustro de Sor Juana, en donde imparte el seminario de filosofía de la comunicación. / 
http://interregno.org     http://radiogramas.org    http://radio1978.org/
 
FOTÓGRAFO : Luis Mendez (b. 1976, Mexico)  Freelance photographer at 82Photo /  http://www.ochentaydos.com
DISEÑADORA : Laura Balboa (b. 1979, Mexico)  Realizó estudios en artes visuales en la Escuela de Pintura, Escultura y Grabado "La Esmeralda" y de diseño gráfico en la Facultad de Estudios Superiores Acatlán afiliada a la Universidad Autónoma de México. Ha impartido cursos de arte y tecnología para niños, cursos de diseño y comunicación gráfica, talleres sobre tecnología e internet en la vida diaria y cursos de artes visuales para enfermos psiquiátricos en reclusión. / http://www.laurabalboa.com
DELEATUR ESTUDIO / Taller de edición : Deleátur es un estudio de asesoría y de servicios editoriales que promueve, asimismo, la investigación, la formación profesional y la creatividad editorial. / http://www.deleatur.com.mx

story:
I am an artist striving towards the truth.  I offer myself as a bridge between races, sexualities, religions, and religious believers and non-believers.  Through my work, I examine all sides of conflict and use this truth to bring us together.

Dear Family, Friend, and Arts Supporters,

I’m excited to announce that I’ve been accepted into the Lambda Literary Foundation Writing Retreat that will take place in Los Angeles. July 28 to August 4th. Many of you know I am the primary caregiver for my mother who has dementia.  This is time-consuming and  takes away a lot of my focus. To have the opportunity to go away for a week and focus on my work is an incredible gift

 

I will have the opportunity to workshop my writing and work on my book that I have been working on the last two years.  I look forward to getting my book out there; I believe it will have great social impact,  I also look forward to interacting with other LGBT writers which I haven’t done to this extent since I first started reading my work in the late 90’s at Different Light Bookstore in West Hollywood, CA.

My Lambda donor page covered my tuition  Here I'm trying to cover travel and those hidden expenses.   I also lose any monies during the week I am in LA.

All this is quite humbling. Years ago, I delivered a speech entitled “No One Stands Alone” in Toastmaster’s International World Championship of Public Speaking.  The theme of my speech was we are all the products of acts of kindness – words spoken, and deeds done.  I’ve always recognized that and have tried to give in the ways that I could. I look forward to the day when I am financially assisting other creative people  in making their dreams come true. 

If you can help me, I’d appreciate it.  If not, I understand and thanks for taking the time to read this.

story:
South Dakota Internship 2012

Hello! My name is Maddie, and I am creating this campaign to help fund my summer-long mission trip to Eagle Butte, South Dakota. I am an upcoming sophomore at the University of Tennessee, and this will be my third trip to South Dakota. 

The past two summers, I have had the incredible opportunity of going to an indian reservation in South Dakota for one week. While there, my team and I have put on Vacation Bible School for the children in several very small (10-20 homes) communities on the reservation. These communities are extremely impoverished, and they are about 50 miles away from a gallon of milk. The children in these small "towns" do not see much hope in their lives, and will surely see none if someone does not step in and show it to them.

This summer, I have been blessed with the opportunity to go to this reservation for the entire summer. I will be living in a town called Eagle Butte, where I will be working as an intern at the tiny church we have partnered with for the past two years, First Baptist Church of Eagle Butte; I will be going without a team, completely on my own. While there, I will help put on Vacation Bible School, teach Sunday school, help lead worship in the church, coordinate mission trips that other churches will be taking to Eagle Butte, and doing just about anything and everything the staff at the church needs me to.

I have created this campaign to raise enough money to sustain me while I live there, get me home at the end of the summer, and hopefully invest a little in the lives of the young people in Eagle Butte and the surrounding communities. Any donation helps, and if you are unable to donate, please keep the children on the reservation in your prayers; they need hope, and I pray the Lord can use me to show them some of the hope He has given me in my life.

Every Dollar Counts! 

This trip is a very flexible one; because the costs are not set in stone, I simply need enough to get me through the summer. The church at Eagle Butte has already sacrificially paid for my trip from Tennessee to South Dakota, but I will still need funding for the rest of the trip as I will not be paid for my work there, and will not have a job otherwise.

My goal is to raise $1000. This, added to the money I have already, should cover living expenses, transportation, and work that is needed for my car before I drive it halfway across the country. 

At the end of the summer if there are somehow leftover funds, they will go to First Baptist Church of Eagle Butte. 

How Your Donation Helps

In the past two summers, we have seen several children come to know Christ as their savior through Vacation Bible School. This is a rare occurrence on the reservation, as the adults who live there are generally very traditional, and hold to the beliefs of their ancestors. Rather than worshiping the Creator, they worship the created, and this has left the reservation hopeless.

My hope is to see more changed lives among the children on the reservation. Jesus said to come to him with a childlike faith, and there are few things that bring joy and hope into hardened hearts like the faith of a child. This is not only my hope, but also the hope of the team that will be joining me for a week in July. This is the same team that has allowed me to serve alongside them for the past two summers, from our church Sevier Heights Baptist in Knoxville, TN. 

We as a group have one vision--to see change on the indian reservation in South Dakota, and to see that change begin in the hearts of the children. We see a new generation, one that is full of hope, ambition, and passion for the Lord. 

Funding Is Not All I Need! 

If you are unable to contribute financially, there is something you can do that is of far greater worth: pray. This town is a very spiritually dark place, and can, at times, be dangerous for followers of Christ. Pray for my safety, but even more pray that the Lord will soften the hearts of the Lakota-Sioux indians and open their ears to hear what He has to say. Pray that he will give me boldness and the right words to say. 

I am more than grateful for every prayer you pray for me; I need it more than anything else. Thank you for your interest in my trip!

story:
(Español abajo)

See a short video about Paco's case here in English
 or aqui en español

Summary

Hi, my name is Gráinne. I have the most awesome dog in the world named Finbarr. He is a loveable little guy, FULL of energy! His hobbies include; rolling over and getting belly rubs, peeing on trees, running around chasing tennis balls, and doing a lot of tricks for treats. And although he might not know it yet, he's coming with me to walk the Camino de Santiago in Spain on April 23rd! I'm 29 years old and I'm from Ireland. After working in a job for more than 5 years, I stopped. I simply realised that I needed to follow what I was passionate about instead. I think we all reach a point in our lives when we want more from ourselves and when we want to give more to those around us; to really make a difference. 

Last year I came across something that I felt truly passionate about; the story of Paco Larrañaga. Here is someone who has missed out on a lot of fun we've all had growing up. He was wrongly convcited aged 19 in 1997 and he is still in prison now. After watching a film called Give Up Tomorrow last year about his case I just knew I had to do something to help. First I gave a major contribution to the campaign that helped launch the Free Paco Now campaign, and then I started working to get the film screened in festivals all over Ireland. I go and promote the screenings every way I can (with Finbarr of course). You can see some photos here.

And now here I am, about to embark on a massive 356mile (573km) journey walking across northern Spain, with my little dog, to raise funds and awareness for his case.

Tell Me More

So my dog and I are setting off for Spain to trek the Camino de Santiago for Paco. We will walk 356 miles (573km), which is the exact distance that Paco Larrañaga was from the scene of the alleged crime on the 16th July 1997. The trek should take about 30 days. Paco has served nearly 15 years in prisons in both the Philippines and Spain for a crime he had no part in.

Quick summary of Paco’s situation: Paco Larrañaga, despite having 42 witnesses, photos, and loads of physical evidence on his side, was convicted for a crime that happened on a different island, 356 miles away on the day he was taking exams at cooking school. You can watch a short video summary of the injustice here.

Are you sure he’s innocent? YES! But I’m not the only one. Paco’s case has been championed by Amnesty International, Fair Trials International, Reprieve, and the United Nations Human Rights Committee (read the decision here). They were successful in saving him from being executed, but he remains wrongfully imprisoned. Paco was 19 when he was locked up and is now 34. This innocent man deserves a chance at a real life. One where he can freely walk around and enjoy the daily things we all take for granted, like grabbing a coffee, meeting with friends, walking through a park, looking at funny stuff on the internet. Just think of all the things you've done in the past 15 years!

HOW YOU CAN BE A PART OF THE CAMINO FOR PACO:

What We Need

This 15 year ordeal has taken a toll on Paco and his family in every way imaginable; in order to sustain this battle they need our help. My goal of $14,500 is $1000 for each year Paco has been in prison. He is now fighting a  battle on 2 fronts, both the Philippines and Spain. Money will go directly to the FREE PACO NOW campaign. This is where we can really make a difference in his life right away. Our target is modest comapared to what is actually needed, so I hope together we can exceed this goal. In return you will receive a reward of your choice; there's lots to choose from! European funders please keep in mind that $1 is 76cent so $60 is only €45.

25% Towards Philippine Innocence Project

At Paco’s request, a percentage of the money will also be allocated to help the launching of the Innocence Project in the Philippines to help others wrongfully convicted.

"If this tragedy that happened to me can be used to prevent another innocent person from suffering the same injustice and even save lives, then all those years that I have suffered would not be in vain. To believe that somehow you can be an instrument of change for the better makes your cross easier to bear." Paco Larrañaga

15% Towards Irish Animal Rescue Centres

As Finbarr himself is a rescue dog, a percentage of the money raised will also go to the Friends of Animals Rescue Centre Mullingar and the Dog Action Welfare Group Cork in Ireland. These two great voluntary groups provide a home for stray, neglected and abandoned dogs and ultimately give them a second chance at life. If those dogs had been left with the council dog pound they would have been destroyed after 5 days. In these two areas alone, a total of 830 dogs were destroyed by the council pounds in 2010. Both shelters have over 70 dogs in their care awaiting new homes. For every dog that is re-homed, more are waiting to come into the shelters. In 2011, D.A.W.G helped 998 dogs. Many of the dogs that come into their care require extensive veterinary care resulting in huge costs for both shelters. As both shelters are run mainly by volunteers they survive on funds and donations from the public to keep going. 

The Impact

What happened to Paco clearly shows that there are cracks in the Justice system of the Philippines that need to be addressed. Although it may takes years to fix the systemic problems of the Philippine police force and justice system, the creation of a Philippine Innocence Project would be the first important step to preventing injustice and saving the wrongfully accused. Had there been DNA testing in the Philippines when Paco and his 6 other co-accused were arrested, the course of their lives would have been completely different. Paco would like your help to save others through the Philippine Innocence Project.

Please consider sponsoring my trip so that we can help to correct this injustice as soon as possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help by sharing this page with friends and helping me get the word out. Just use the share button at the top of the page. Follow me on twitter @Caminoforpaco. 

You can also help by checking out my facebook page and following my progress. I'll be regularly posting photos and updates there, before and during my trek, so it's easy to keep up to date with Camino for Paco!

The support so far for Paco's case has been incredible with everyone wanting to know how they can help, so I hope that this Indiegogo campaign will be a success.

With much love and gratitude from your partners on this trek for justice,
Gráinne & Finbarr

See a short video about Paco's case here in English
 or aqui en español

RESUMEN

Hola, mi nombre es Gráinne y tengo el mejor perro del mundo, Finbarr. Es un pequeño adorable con mucha energía. Entre sus hobbies está el de girarse sobre sí mismo y coleccionar caricias en la barriga, orinar en los árboles, correr detrás de pelotas de tenis y hacer muchos trucos para obtener premios. Y aunque todavía no lo sabe ¡se viene conmigo a recorrer el Camino de Santiago en España el 23 de abril!

Tengo 29 años y soy irlandesa. Tras cinco años trabajando, lo he dejado. Me he dado cuenta que necesito seguir mis pasiones. Creo que todos, en algún momento, queremos dar más de nosotros mismo y ayudar a los que están a nuestro alrededor; hacer algo que realmente suponga una diferencia.

El año pasado algo me hizo hervir por dentro; la historia de Paco Larrañaga. Una persona que no ha disfrutado de su juventud. En 1997, con 19 años fue condenado de forma errónea y sigue en prisión. Después de ver el documental Give Up Tomorrow (Ríndete Mañana)  supe que debía hacer algo por ayudarle. Primero hice una gran donación a la campaña Free Paco Now. Y después hice todo lo posible para que la película se proyectara por toda Irlanda y participara en Festivales de todo el país. Cada día promociono la película (con Finbarr, por supuesto). Puedes ver fotos aquí.

Pero ahora aquí estoy, a punto de embarcarme en una caminata de 573 kilómetros a través del norte de España, con mi pequeño perro, para llamar la atención y conseguir fondos para su causa.

CUÉNTAME MÁS

Así que mi perro y yo estamos preparados para hacer el Camino de Santiago en España. Caminaremos 573 kilómetros, que es la distancia exacta que separaba a Paco del lugar donde tuvieron lugar los supuestos crímenes el 16 de julio de 1997. La caminata debería durar 30 días. Paco lleva ya 15 años en prisión, entre Filipinas y España por un crimen que no cometió.

Breve resumen del caso Paco Larrañaga: Aunque tenía 42 testigos, fotos y muchas pruebas físicas que avalaban su coartada, Paco Larrañaga fue encontrado culpable de un crimen que tuvo lugar en una isla separada por 573 kilómetros de donde él se encontraba, examinándose en una escuela de cocina. Puedes ver un pequeño vídeo de esta injusticia aquí.

¿Estás seguro de su inocencia? ¡SI! Y no soy la única. El caso de Paco ha sido defendido por Amnistía Internacional, Fair Trails Internationa, Reprieve y el Comité de Derechos Humanos de las Naciones Unidas (lee aquí la documentación). Le salvaron de ser ejecutado por inyección letal pero sigue erróneamente encarcelado. Paco tenía 19 años cuando fue sentenciado, ahora tiene 34. Este hombre inocente merece un cambio en su vida. Un cambio que le permita caminar libre y disfrutar de las cosas que cada día damos por supuesto, como disfrutar de un café, encontrarse con amigos, pasear por el parque, reírse en Internet. ¡Piensa en todas las cosas que has hecho en estos últimos 15 años!

¿CÓMO PUEDES TÚ FORMAR PARTE DEL CAMINO POR PACO?:

Lo que necesitamos

Esta penosa odisea que dura ya casi 15 años ha supuesto un duro golpe a Paco y su familia en todas las formas que te puedas imaginar. Para seguir su lucha, necesitan de nuestra ayuda. Mi objetivo es conseguir 14.500 dólares, 1.000 dólares por año de condena de Paco. Ahora lucha en dos frentes: en Filipinas y España. El dinero irá directamente a la campaña  FREE PACO NOW. Aquí es dónde realmente podemos cambiar las cosas. Nuestro objetivo es muy modesto comparado con lo que en realidad necesita. Así que espero poder superarlo. En recompensa recibirás un regalo de tu elección: ¡hay muchos para elegir! Para los donantes europeos, por favor, tener en cuenta que 1 dólar son sólo 76 céntimos de euro, así que 60 dólares son 45 euros.  

25% Para Innocence Project en Filipinas

Por petición del propio Paco, un porcentaje del dinero recolectado será destinado a la campaña de implantación de Innocence Project en Filipinas, para evitar que otros inocentes sean condenados injustamente.

"Si esta tragedia que me ha pasado a mí puede ser usada para prevenir que otras personas inocentes sean condenadas de forma injusta y puedan salvar su vida, entonces todos los años que he sufrido en prisión no habrán sido en vano. Creer que de alguna manera puedes ser un instrumento para mejorar las cosas, te hace todo más llevadero”.

15% Para Irish Animal Rescue Centres (Centros de animales rescatados de Irlanda)

Como Finbarr es un perro que ha sido rescatado, un porcentaje del dinero recolectado irá a las organizaciones “Friends of Animals Rescue Centre Mullingar” y “Dog Action Welfare Group Cork” de Irlanda. Estas dos agrupaciones de voluntarios proporcionan hogar a perros callejeros, descuidados y abandonados para darles una segunda oportunidad en la vida. Si estos perros son abandonados en la perrera, hubieran muerto en 5 días. Sólo en esta zona de Irlanda, un total de 830 perros han muerto en la perrera.  Ambas organizaciones tienen acogidos 70 perros. Por cada perro acogido, hay otro que espera poder serlo. En el año 2011, D.A.W.G. acogió a 998 perros.  Muchos de estos perros necesitan cuidados de un veterinario, lo que supone un gran coste. Ambas asociaciones se mantienen por donaciones del público y voluntarios.

El Impacto

La situación de Paco demuestra que existen agujeros negros en el sistema judicial filipino que deben ser reparados. Aunque puede llevar muchos años arreglar los problemas que tiene Filipinas con la policía y el sistema judicial, la implantación del programa Innocence Project es un importante paso para prevenir la injusticia y salvar a muchos acusados de forma errónea. Si se hubieran aceptado las pruebas de ADN en Filipinas cuando Paco  y sus 6 compañeros fueron arrestados, el curso de sus vidas hubiera sido diferente. Paco quiere ayudar a otros mediante la implantación del proyecto Innocence Project en Filipinas, que determina el uso de pruebas de ADN, lo antes posible.

Otras formas de ayudar

Puedes ayudarnos a dar a conocer esta página al compartirla con tus amigos. Dale a “share/compartir” al principio de esta página. Síguenos en twitter @Caminoforpaco. 

También puedes ayudar entrando en mi página de facebook y seguir mis progresos. Con frecuencia colgaré fotos y actualizaré la página antes y durante cada caminata. ¡Así que es muy fácil saber por dónde voy en el Camino por Paco!

Hasta ahora, el apoyo al caso de Paco ha sido increíble. Así que espero que esta campaña de Indiegogo sea otro éxito.


Con todo mi amor y gratitud de tus compañeros en esta cruzada contra la injusticia,
Gráinne & Finbarr

(Español abajo)

Summary
Hi, my name is Gráinne. I have the most awesome dog in the world named Finbarr. He is a loveable little guy, FULL of energy! His hobbies include; rolling over and getting belly rubs, peeing on trees, running around chasing tennis balls, and doing a lot of tricks for treats. And although he might not know it yet, he's coming with me to walk the Camino de Santiago in Spain on April 23rd! I'm 29 years old and I'm from Ireland. After working in a job for more than 5 years, I stopped. I simply realised that I needed to follow what I was passionate about instead. I think we all reach a point in our lives when we want more from ourselves and when we want to give more to those around us; to really make a difference. 
Last year I came across something that I felt truly passionate about; the story of Paco Larrañaga. Here is someone who has missed out on a lot of fun we've all had growing up. He was wrongly convcited aged 19 in 1997 and he is still in prison now. After watching a film called Give Up Tomorrow last year about his case I just knew I had to do something to help. First I gave a major contribution to the campaign that helped launch the Free Paco Now campaign, and then I started working to get the film screened in festivals all over Ireland. I go and promote the screenings every way I can (with Finbarr of course). You can see some photos here.
And now here I am, about to embark on a massive 356mile (573km) journey walking across northern Spain, with my little dog, to raise funds and awareness for his case.
Tell Me More
So my dog and I are setting off for Spain to trek the Camino de Santiago for Paco. We will walk 356 miles (573km), which is the exact distance that Paco Larrañaga was from the scene of the alleged crime on the 16th July 1997. The trek should take about 30 days. Paco has served nearly 15 years in prisons in both the Philippines and Spain for a crime he had no part in.
Quick summary of Paco’s situation: Paco Larrañaga, despite having 42 witnesses, photos, and loads of physical evidence on his side, was convicted for a crime that happened on a different island, 356 miles away on the day he was taking exams at cooking school. You can watch a short video summary of the injustice here.
Are you sure he’s innocent? YES! But I’m not the only one. Paco’s case has been championed by Amnesty International, Fair Trials International, Reprieve, and the United Nations Human Rights Committee (read the decision here). They were successful in saving him from being executed, but he remains wrongfully imprisoned. Paco was 19 when he was locked up and is now 34. This innocent man deserves a chance at a real life. One where he can freely walk around and enjoy the daily things we all take for granted, like grabbing a coffee, meeting with friends, walking through a park, looking at funny stuff on the internet. Just think of all the things you've done in the past 15 years!
HOW YOU CAN BE A PART OF THE CAMINO FOR PACO:


What We Need
This 15 year ordeal has taken a toll on Paco and his family in every way imaginable; in order to sustain this battle they need our help. My goal of $14,500 is $1000 for each year Paco has been in prison. He is now fighting a  battle on 2 fronts, both the Philippines and Spain. Money will go directly to the FREE PACO NOW campaign. This is where we can really make a difference in his life right away. Our target is modest comapared to what is actually needed, so I hope together we can exceed this goal. In return you will receive a reward of your choice; there's lots to choose from! European funders please keep in mind that $1 is 76cent so $60 is only €45.
25% Towards Philippine Innocence Project
At Paco’s request, a percentage of the money will also be allocated to help the launching of the Innocence Project in the Philippines to help others wrongfully convicted.
"If this tragedy that happened to me can be used to prevent another innocent person from suffering the same injustice and even save lives, then all those years that I have suffered would not be in vain. To believe that somehow you can be an instrument of change for the better makes your cross easier to bear." Paco Larrañaga
15% Towards Irish Animal Rescue Centres
As Finbarr himself is a rescue dog, a percentage of the money raised will also go to the Friends of Animals Rescue Centre Mullingar and the Dog Action Welfare Group Cork in Ireland. These two great voluntary groups provide a home for stray, neglected and abandoned dogs and ultimately give them a second chance at life. If those dogs had been left with the council dog pound they would have been destroyed after 5 days. In these two areas alone, a total of 830 dogs were destroyed by the council pounds in 2010. Both shelters have over 70 dogs in their care awaiting new homes. For every dog that is re-homed, more are waiting to come into the shelters. In 2011, D.A.W.G helped 998 dogs. Many of the dogs that come into their care require extensive veterinary care resulting in huge costs for both shelters. As both shelters are run mainly by volunteers they survive on funds and donations from the public to keep going. 


The Impact
What happened to Paco clearly shows that there are cracks in the Justice system of the Philippines that need to be addressed. Although it may takes years to fix the systemic problems of the Philippine police force and justice system, the creation of a Philippine Innocence Project would be the first important step to preventing injustice and saving the wrongfully accused. Had there been DNA testing in the Philippines when Paco and his 6 other co-accused were arrested, the course of their lives would have been completely different. Paco would like your help to save others through the Philippine Innocence Project.
Please consider sponsoring my trip so that we can help to correct this injustice as soon as possible.


Other Ways You Can Help

You can help by sharing this page with friends and helping me get the word out. Just use the share button at the top of the page. Follow me on twitter @Caminoforpaco. You can also help by checking out my facebook page and following my progress. I'll be regularly posting photos and updates there, before and during my trek, so it's easy to keep up to date with Camino for Paco!The support so far for Paco's case has been incredible with everyone wanting to know how they can help, so I hope that this Indiegogo campaign will be a success.With much love and gratitude from your partners on this trek for justice,Gráinne & Finbarr

See a short video about Paco's case here in English or aqui en español

story:
The KSera Group is made up of individuals who are passionate about addiction recovery and wish to cultivate a community that promotes healthy living.  


What is Turn It Over Magazine?

It is our vision to bring together the recovery community by sharing experiences, information and knowledge that promotes health and resilience in recovery.  Turn It Over is a free magazine and will be published bi-monthly.  Readers will find information on AA/NA and other 12-step fellowships, treatment, cutting-edge addiction research, health, personal growth, creative expression, news, interviews, resources and events that support long term recovery.   


Where will your money go?

Your contribution will allow us to print and distribute our first issue and to release the first on-line issue.


Other Ways You Can Help

There are several ways you can help out without donating:

  • Please share this campaign with your friends on Facebook and Twitter
  • Email us your suggestions and story ideas to info@turnitovernyc.com
  • Consider becoming a contributor to Turn It Over magazine.  We will be looking for articles, stories, and other creative expression.

The KSera Group is made up of individuals who are passionate about addiction recovery and wish to cultivate a community that promotes healthy living.  


What is Turn It Over Magazine?

It is our vision to bring together the recovery community by sharing experiences, information and knowledge that promotes health and resilience in recovery.  Turn It Over is a free magazine and will be published bi-monthly.  Readers will find information on AA/NA and other 12-step fellowships, treatment, cutting-edge addiction research, health, personal growth, creative expression, news, interviews, resources and events that support long term recovery.   


Where will your money go?

Your contribution will allow us to print and distribute our first issue and to release the first on-line issue.



Other Ways You Can Help
There are several ways you can help out without donating:

Please share this campaign with your friends on Facebook and Twitter
Email us your suggestions and story ideas to info@turnitovernyc.com
Consider becoming a contributor to Turn It Over magazine.  We will be looking for articles, stories, and other creative expression.

story:
Summary

I’ve had many opportunities to witness the effects of bullying while working as a librarian. When I realized that modern technology had enhanced the bully's ability to cause pain—with students seemingly unaware of the true danger of the electronic toys that ruled their days—I designed an anti-bullying curriculum to incorporate into my lessons. I researched everything I could find about the subject, and what I found stunned and horrified me.

Being a librarian, I know that young people need a user-friendly way to understand the problem. They need to easily grasp both how a bully works and how to recognize the signs that someone is a bullying victim. Gray Zone was written to give them that knowledge and to open a much-needed dialog.

I have a master of library and information science and a bachelor of arts in anthropology, both from the University of Washington, as well as a master of fine arts in creative writing from Full Sail University.

 I’ve written the book. I need your help getting it out there.

 What I Need

Promoting a book so that it gets in front of the right people can be a laborious and costly project. I need money for:

-Book reviews from Booklist, Clarion, Kirkus, and Publisher's Weekly. Objective reviews from these professionals are necessary to put Gray Zone firmly on the radar of book buyers.

-Sell Sheets. A one-page sheet that gives details of the book to potential buyers in libraries, bookstores, and other organizations. My background is in writing and I need a graphic designer to make a professional quality sell sheet.

-Postage and printing. Some organizations will accept a sell sheet electronically, but many still prefer to have it sent through the mail.

-Publicity Campaign. A press kit is needed as well as multiple press releases. The releases need to be written and distributed through the proper channels at the appropriate times. Again, this is an area in which I have no experience and need professional help.

For your help the most precious thing I can give you, other than heartfelt thanks, is a copy of my book. Every contributor above the $25 level gets a signed copy, and gets it before the publication date. So your contribution will let you be ahead of the crowd!

Why I’m doing this

I wrote Gray Zone because I saw a need. Cyberbullying is just too rampant in today’s world and it’s up to us to put a stop to it.

Gray Zone is the tool we need to do this.

I realize that not everyone will be able to contribute monetarily. That’s okay.

I will appreciate any help you can give to get the word out. Mentions on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media you use will make all the difference between a successful campaign and one that flops.

Thank you, and see you around!

-Postage and printing. Some organizations will accept a sell sheet electronically, but many still prefer to have it sent through the mail.
-Publicity Campaign. A press kit is needed as well as multiple press releases. The releases need to be written and distributed through the proper channels at the appropriate times. Again, this is an area in which I have no experience and need professional help.
For your help the most precious thing I can give you, other than heartfelt thanks, is a copy of my book. Every contributor above the $25 level gets a signed copy, and gets it before the publication date. So your contribution will let you be ahead of the crowd!
Why I’m doing this
I wrote Gray Zone because I saw a need. Cyberbullying is just too rampant in today’s world and it’s up to us to put a stop to it.
Gray Zone is the tool we need to do this.
I realize that not everyone will be able to contribute monetarily. That’s okay.
I will appreciate any help you can give to get the word out. Mentions on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media you use will make all the difference between a successful campaign and one that flops.
Thank you, and see you around!

story:
About This Fundraiser

Hi everybody,

As most of you will know, my name is Adrian Dziewanski. As a lot of you probably don't know, I spend a great deal of my time writing poetry. Until this point in my writing "career" (more like a passionate hobby), I've made little effort to get my work out into the world aside from the occasional open mic reading.

I'd like to change all that with your help. I've completed two chapbooks of poetry, one of which, is a collection of nearly all of the work I've done up to this point. So please help in contributing and I will personally deliver what is essentially my life's story, straight to your doorstep. That is, I will actually get on my bike and deliver it to your doorstep. 

As much as I would love to be 100% self motivated in my pursuit of words onto the page, there comes a point when even the most humble of artists/writers need recognition in one form or another. I'm seeking this now and I promise that a donation in any amount would go a long way.

What you are Funding

The money will help fuel not only my artistic esteem, but will go towards a brand new book of poems! It's hard to say what the new book will consist of, but I've been writing a lot of haikus and haiku variations as of late, if that gives any clues. For some reason I already have a working title for it: "The Ground is Lava". I Hope to have this work completed by mid October. 

What You Get When You Help Me

I'm the one raising the funds, but you are the one getting the reward. Ha!

My contribution ladder looks like this:

$5 : gets you a copy of my first chapbook "Epoch of Humility", a fifteen page long poem that I regard as the pinnacle of my writing to date. 

$10 : gets you a copy of "Hellodrama", a full collection of poems from 2008-2013. These books are perfect bound on professional paper stock and come in one of three colours: green, white or salmon. You get to choose your colour.

$13 : gets you both "Hellodrama" and "Epoch of Humility".

$15+ : gets you both "Hellodrama", "Epoch of Humility" and a personalized haiku written on the inside cover of the former. 

All funds will go towards a new chapbook of haikus, even if I don't reach my goal of $200. (I know it says $500, but that's only because that was the minimum amount)

*Please view the gallery tab at top of page to see photos of the above mentioned books

The Impact

I believe, and have always believed, that funding creative projects is important. I've made efforts to purchase peoples' writing, music and art in the past. Now I'm just asking for a little bit in return. 

This is the reason why I get up in the morning. I hope you can relate and equate that to something you feel passionate about in your life. It's important.  

Other Ways You Can Help

I know we are all broke, so if you really can't spare 5 bucks then please help me spread the word about this little fundraiser. Or you can come to my next reading.

story:
Entrepreneurs and business people have a bad habit of letting their work consume them.

Life Support is a book to help revive happiness in the business person!


WORK! GO! SWEAT! BLEED!

Feed that giant machine of commerce and industry! Trade half your
waking hours for money that you will throw right back into that same
machine!

NO! WAIT! DON'T DO THAT!

You don't really want to do you? I didn't think so. Most people don’t,
but for some reason, most people do it anyway.


Why?


Because of this:
Society has attempted to define success for us. It bellows in its big
burly voice, “You shall decide at a young age what you want to do with
your life (even though you have no life experience to pull from). You
shall then dump all of your time, effort and money (plus that of your
parents) into pursuing that occupation. You shall find a job that
necessitates at least ⅓ of your life is given to a purpose that is not
yours. At a later date you shall decide it is not what you had hoped.
You shall then have a shining moment where you want to change your
life and do what it is that you know in your heart will bring you joy.
But you shall bury that idea under the criticism of your peers and
instead turn to wasteful consumption. You shall purchase a 3000 square
foot house with 3 bedrooms and a front attached garage, 2 cars, 5 tv’s
and procreate 2.3 times. Eventually you shall try to gain the crown as
"the one with the most toys". You shall cry out, “Why am I not happy?”
Then you shall die. Your 2.3 offspring shall then repeat this pattern
from your example.”

It is up to you and I to shout back at that big booming voice, “Screw off!”

Life Support is a book aimed at helping people wake up out of the
nightmare of prescribed definitions of success and say, “Here is what
I want out of life. Me. This human being with unique needs, talents
and desires”

By stripping away life down to its core, finding what a person’s true
values and needs are and then rebuilding life around that, one can
live a truly happy and fulfilled life. What that looks like will be
different for each of us. Some will be simple, some will be
extravagant, but all will be genuine.

The more voices shouting back, the louder the message will be. Your
support in bringing this book to print will allow this message to be
read by more people who will join in the shouting. Eventually, that
big booming voice will be drowned out by people living in ways that
bring genuine satisfaction and happiness.

Your support will be used to:

  • Hire an editor to make it a nice smooth read.
  • Pay for cover design
  • Cover the costs of publishing in print and electronic formats.
  • Satisfy the fees and taxes involved with raising these funds through
  • Indigogo.
  • Get the message out to those who are drowning in their business and
  • need Life Support!

Working with you to get this book out into the world is somethign I am really looking forward to. I believe that almost all great opportunities come from the people around me so if you would like to chat, please feel free to contact me. You never know what opportunities we could present to each other!

story:
• Last Week of Campaign!!!
  • Raising funds to finish publication and marketing
  • First book in a New Saga

The year is 2319.  The war with the Serken is finally turning to the favor of the Allied worlds for the first time in over a decade, yet it is far from over.  Lt. Commander Roy O’Hara leads his squadron of combat fighters against the enemies latest Super Destroyer and is shot down over an unexplored planet.  Near death Roy is found by Katreena, a beautiful and mysterious woman who takes him in and saves his life with the Boto Stone.  Yet the power of the stone is more than even she could know as it draws their minds and spirits together.  Words fail them as there are no translations, but shared images and dreams teach them how much they truly have in common.  For a moment they find in each other what they both had lost and an unguarded moment leads to a forbidden night of intimacy.  An act that is not just shameful for Katreena, but gravely dangerous as it is a betrayal of her duty to the crown.  Katreena abandons Roy, who finds himself among humans who don’t understand his language and live a medieval existence. His only hope of contacting his fleet to be rescued is in finding the remains of his ship somewhere on the planet.  Yet his quest takes him on a much different journey.  The planet not only holds secrets to a long lost alien weapon, but also to his own destiny as he unexpectedly steps into their prophecy of the return of the Serpents and they believe him to be the Commander of Prophecy sent by God to save them all.  A role he does not want, but must take on as his war is about to reach their world, his bond with Katreena grows and the power to destroy entire planets is rediscovered.

A little know fact is that most publishers no longer invest capital in new writers.  The cost of editing, proofing, art design and marketing are put on the writer.  I have invested all I can from my own savings, but I've come up short.  Please don't let my dream die on the vine.  Anything will help. 


Thank you.

story:
O autor

Luiz Cezar de Araujo, 33, nasceu em Palmas-PR. Atualmente mora em Curitiba com a esposa e os três filhos.

A obra

Manifestações de rua que incitam a revolução numa cidadezinha de interior. Advogados recém-formados que buscam o sucesso na capital. Dois colegas de trabalho que descobrem um grande esquema de corrupção. Cobiça, sucesso, fracasso e traição. Um professor aposentado que sonha com a glória literária. Estes são alguns dos temas e personagens que compõem os cinco contos de "A Vida é Traição", do estreante Luiz Cézar de Araújo.

Num estilo clássico - leve, rápido e engraçado - que remete aos grandes mestres da narração como Flaubert e Stendhal, o autor faz girar uma roda da fortuna, cega e aleatória, que joga com o destino dos personagens, ao mesmo tempo em que surpreende o leitor através das reviravoltas mais inesperadas.

Mais do que contos, "A Vida é Traição" oferece um salutar sopro de realismo e criatividade às letras nacionais.

Por que sua ajuda é importante

Queremos baratear todos os custos de edição do livro. Precisamos de recursos para a arte da capa, revisão, diagramação e impressão da primeira tiragem. Através do financiamento coletivo, que na prática funciona como uma espécie de pré-venda, acreditamos que será possível viabilizar inúmero projetos editorias.

A Editora

O livro faz parte do projeto editorial da Livraria Danúbio, baseada em Curitiba, que pretende lançar vários autores estreantes no mercado brasileiro.

Pra conseguirmos sucesso, contudo, precisamos MUITO da sua contribuição!

Do lado direito do seu monitor, você vai encontrar as opções de doação.

Vale qualquer ajuda!

Se não puder contribuir financeiramente, ajude-nos ao menos na divulgação: COMPARTILHE este link o máximo de vezes que puder!

story:
My Autobiography - Maikel Nabil Sanad

It’s said that history is written by the victorious. It’s one of the privileges of being a winner to be able to write and re-write history. As long as you can’t write history, then you aren’t completely a winner yet.

For the Egyptian authorities, I’m just a criminal who had been in jail before for his crimes, and who is living abroad to avoid being in jail again for the crimes committed while being abroad. That’s the history that the Egyptian dictatorship wants to write. If they are to become winners, this will be the known story for generations to come. But if I can prevent them from writing my history, they will never be able to be counted victorious.

That’s why my story has to be told and known, and stories of those who struggled against the Egyptian dictatorship, to prevent present and future leaders of Egypt from writing their own version of history. Because, even after prison and exile,  the battle won’t be over until a winner writes history, and I wanna write it!


Why this book is important?

I believe my story is unique. I see the politic situation from a different prospective than the conservative majority in Egypt. Even, I was born to a Christian family, I maybe was the first Egyptian in our time to say in public that he is an atheist. I was also the first Egyptian to refuse the military service in conscientious grounds. I was, and maybe still, the only Egyptian opposition figure promoting peace ties with Israel.

For what I said and done, I was detained five times in Egypt. Last time, I was put on military trial twice, then sentenced to three years. Thanks to a huge international campaign, and to my 130 days hunger strike, I was released after 10 months. I faced torture, and was put in a mental hospital as a punishment for my writings. After I left Egypt, Egyptian authorities accused me with blasphemy because of my atheism.

Such sacrifices didn't go unnoticed. I was awarded several prizes, and was nominated to the Nobel Peace Prize in 2012.

Read my short biography here: http://www.maikelnabil.com/2010/12/my-cv.html


The Campaign:

This Campaign aims to create some funds which I can use until I'm able to finish the book. I wrote one third of the book already, and I should have it ready for translation in spring 2015. I'll use the money of the campaign to cover myself during the period of writing the book, and to fund translating it from Standard Arabic to English. Without this money, I'll have to work on something else to make a living.

I've been a successful writer during the last years. Some of my articles were read by hundreds of thousands, and were translated to several languages. My articles were published in Egyptian, Arabic, English, German, Dutch, Danish, Italian, Spanish, Hebrew and other languages. Several famous newspapers ran my pieces, including; The Wall Street Journal, The Foreign Policy, Haaretz, Times of Israel, The Daily Beast, Die Zeit and others.


How you can help:

- You can use the perks on the side. Choose the perk which suits you better!

- Please, share the link of this campaign with family, friends and all your circles. The more people to know about this campaign, the more likely it will succeed.

- You also can leave a supportive comment on the campaign page to encourage others to contribute as well!


N.B. This is a donation Campaign. All Perks here are counted as donations!

story:
Bonjour à tous,

Je m'appelle Leslie, J'ai 27 ans et maman depuis peu d'un charmant petit bout d'un mois;

C'est avec beaucoup d'espoir que je lance ce projet afin de sauver la santé de ma mère.

Ma mère s'est marié en 2000 et est venue vivre dans la maison de son mari situé en bordure de nationale à Charvonnex en Haute Savoie, maison délabrée mais celui-ci devait la rénover... Chose qu'il n'a jamais fait évidemment , et à préférer partir en laissant cette ruine à ma mère.

Aujourd'hui sa santé se dégrade à vue d’œil à cause de cette maison :

- les vitres ( simple vitrage) gèlent de l’intérieur

- 1800 euros d’électricité en 6 mois

- obligé de dormir avec 7 COUETTES sur le lit!!

- crises d'arthroses liées à l'humidité et au froid ambiant ( 16°c avec chauffage)


Etant mère depuis peu j'aimerai que ma mère puisse profiter de son petit fils, et qu'elle puisse nous recevoir chez elle.

Cet appel à l'aide est pour lui financer la rénovation d'une partie de la maison :

- au niveau du garage afin qu'elle n'ai plus d'escaliers à monter

- poser une fenêtre double vitrage aussi qu'une porte vitrée

-isoler la pièce et poser du placo

En contrepartie , ma mère est une véritable artiste et peut vous réaliser des petites sculptures, bijoux etc, rien que pour vous ainsi qu'une lettre signée par le groin de son cochon domestique ( humour! mais si ça vous tente il n'y a pas de soucis!)

J'espère que vous comprendrez que je ne fais pas cela pour moi , mais pour ma mère, pour qu'elle puisse vivre décemment , et je l'espère plus longtemps, car cette maison la tue à petit feu et je ne veut pas la perdre car je serai resté là à ne rien faire!

Comprendrez vous ma détresse et l'espoir de pouvoir réaliser ce projet pour elle? je l'espère!!! de tout coeur merci d'avance!!!!!
story_txt: Bonjour à tous,Je m'appelle Leslie, J'ai 27 ans et maman depuis peu d'un charmant petit bout d'un mois;C'est avec beaucoup d'espoir que je lance ce projet afin de sauver la santé de ma mère.Ma mère s'est marié en 2000 et est venue vivre dans la maison de son mari situé en bordure de nationale à Charvonnex en Haute Savoie, maison délabrée mais celui-ci devait la rénover... Chose qu'il n'a jamais fait évidemment , et à préférer partir en laissant cette ruine à ma mère.Aujourd'hui sa santé se dégrade à vue d’œil à cause de cette maison :- les vitres ( simple vitrage) gèlent de l’intérieur- 1800 euros d’électricité en 6 mois- obligé de dormir avec 7 COUETTES sur le lit!!- crises d'arthroses liées à l'humidité et au froid ambiant ( 16°c avec chauffage)Etant mère depuis peu j'aimerai que ma mère puisse profiter de son petit fils, et qu'elle puisse nous recevoir chez elle.Cet appel à l'aide est pour lui financer la rénovation d'une partie de la maison :- au niveau du garage afin qu'elle n'ai plus d'escaliers à monter- poser une fenêtre double vitrage aussi qu'une porte vitrée-isoler la pièce et poser du placoEn contrepartie , ma mère est une véritable artiste et peut vous réaliser des petites sculptures, bijoux etc, rien que pour vous ainsi qu'une lettre signée par le groin de son cochon domestique ( humour! mais si ça vous tente il n'y a pas de soucis!)J'espère que vous comprendrez que je ne fais pas cela pour moi , mais pour ma mère, pour qu'elle puisse vivre décemment , et je l'espère plus longtemps, car cette maison la tue à petit feu et je ne veut pas la perdre car je serai resté là à ne rien faire!Comprendrez vous ma détresse et l'espoir de pouvoir réaliser ce projet pour elle? je l'espère!!! de tout coeur merci d'avance!!!!!

story:
Noi siamo Attivamente, un’associazione culturale no profit di Lamezia Terme, una

ridente cittadina al centro della Calabria.Siamo un gruppo di giovani, che opera sul territorio cittadino e regionale da ben cinque anni. Le  passioni che ci accomunano ci hanno portato a riunirci e creare tante iniziative culturali,ludiche e sociali.

La più importante è il Lamezia Comics & Co...

prima RASSEGNA INTERNAZIONALE DEL FUMETTO E CINEMA DI ANIMAZIONE DELLA CALABRIA.

Fumetti, film d'animazione, giochi, cosplay, musica, workshop, ospiti nazionali e internazionali sono la cornice perfetta per dar vita al punto d’incontro per giovani, disegnatori, appassionati e curiosi di tutta la regione e del sud Italia in generale. 

Entrando al Lamezia Comics ci si trova catapultati all’interno di uno spazio vitale ed interattivo che abbraccia sia l'arte, la creatività, ma anche il fumetto e il gioco,  con cura e professionalità le aree della:

  • Cultura tramite la diffusione di fumetti, mostre, film, concerti, presentazione di libri illustrati, incontro e confronto con personalità di rilievo; stimoli per la crescita di ogni persona, giovane o adulta che sia.
  • Socialità attraverso momenti di gioco, di intrattenimento, work-shop; il tutto è basato sul  “gusto dello stare con gli altri, come una famiglia”, per conoscere persone con gli stessi interessi e passioni. Condividendo un momento che sia di spensieratezza ma anche di creatività.
  • Produttività dando spazio a giovani artisti, i quali tramite noi trovano lo spazio, la fiducia, il desiderio di continuare nel loro lavoro o passione che sia e di migliorare le proprie qualità artistiche, riuscendo, in fiera, anche ad affacciarsi al mondo del lavoro (commissione di lavori o vendita di proprie opere); in quest’ambito, il nostro intento è di continuare, sempre più, ad accogliere e riuscire a dare spazio alle sterminate realtà regionali che vivono di questo mondo fantastico, non riuscendo, spesso, ad avere la giusta visibilità.

Da non sottovalutare, infine, la naturale inclinazione della Manifestazione verso le politiche giovanili muovendo un gran numero di ragazzi da tutta la regione a prendere parte, ad esprimersi, a mettersi in gioco nella fiera, riconoscendo nella propria città, nella propria terra, uno spazio veramente loro, accogliente, in cui si possano sentire liberi e capiti. 

Il LameziaComics&Co... : “uno spazio sano e ricco di positività, nel quale ogni ragazzo si sente protagonista”.

E’ proprio questo lo spirito con cui noi dell’Associazione Attivamente (all’interno della quale abbiamo accolto e sono impegnati molti giovani della città) progettiamo, creiamo, e  proponiamo le nostre attività.


La fiera si svolge in tre giorni ed è strutturata in una serie di differenti iniziative, collegate al mondo fantastico, le quali, utilizzando un canale di comunicazione efficace verso i giovani quale è il fumetto, li conduce verso aspetti e valori sia culturali che sociali. Un acculturare divertendosi che i tanti appassionati del settore, soprattutto i più piccoli, possono fare al Lamezia Comics & Co: 

“una iniziativa innovativa ed unica, nel suo genere, rispetto altre proposte culturali attuate dalle varie realtà regionali”.

  • Area Game

Nell’Area Games, saranno presenti Associazioni che organizzano attività ludiche con tornei di giochi da tavolo e carte collezionabili, video giochi, giochi di ruolo e tutte le novità del mondo ludico.

  • Area Mostre

Nell’Area mostre saranno allestite mostre degli autori presenti in fiera ed una ampia sezione dedicate agli emergenti, talenti calabresi e non,  che hanno la possibilità di farsi conoscere. Oltre a mostre di illustrazioni ed opere mirate al fumetto, sarà dato spazio anche ad opere modellistiche; modelli in scala di scorci, figure, rappresentazioni temporali storiche, ricostruzioni fumettistiche etc etc.

  • Area Cinema

Nell’Area Cinema, saranno proiettati film per tutte le età, partendo dal primo pomeriggio fino a tarda notte, dove gli stili e i generi si susseguiranno, dando spazio alle nuove uscite ed ai must dell'animazione e del fantastico in generale.

  • Area Stand

Nell’Area Stands saranno presenti tutti gli Autori invitati, che si metteranno a disposizione degli appassionati, inoltre saranno presenti operatori del settori quali, fumetterie, librerie e case editrici dove gli appassionati hanno la possibilità di acquistare le ultime novita’.

  • Area Workshop ed incontri

Nell’area Workshop saranno organizzati degli incontri con gli ospiti presenti in fiera, con le scuole di fumetto e con tutte le figure professionali condividendo con i partecipanti la loro esperienza. 

  • Area Live

L'area Live è la più eclettica della manifestazione, dove gli eventi si susseguono e variano dal combattimento medievale in armatura al concerto della band che ci riporrà tutte le sigle dei cartoni che tanto amiamo, per poi arrivare alla giornata finale dove il suo aspetto muterà ancora trasformandosi nella passerella che ospiterà il contest cosplay. 

La partecipazione all’evento per i visitatori e’ COMPLETAMENTE GRATUITA a differenza di altre manifestazioni del genere.



 

10.000,00 € è la cifra che dobbiamo raggiungere per poter realizzare il nostro sogno. 

Così che la manifestazione potrà essere fruibile a tutti, grandi e piccini, come crediamo che debbano essere tutte le manifestazioni culturali come il “Lamezia Comics & Co…”. 

Per Ringraziarvi dell'aiuto che ci state già dando, soltanto leggendo questo  testo, abbiamo creato dei "grazie" particolari .

5 € - Supporter Beginner Level

Il grazie più sentito da parte di tutto lo staff e tutti i partecipanti della manifestazione per aver contribuito a realizzarla.

10 € - Supporter Standard Level

Anche voi sarete protagonisti in fiera. All'ingresso verrà creato un banner con il vostro nome/foto. Questo per ringraziarvi ancora meglio di averci aiutato. 

15 € - Supporter Expert Level

Ringraziarvi non sarà mai abbastanza: e noi lo faremo inserendo il vostro nome/foto in fiera con un banner, inserendolo anche sulle pagine ufficiali dei nostri social network, dove anche tutti i nostri fans potranno vedervi.

25 € - Supporter Master Level

  • Supporter standard Level +
  • Supporter Expert Level +
  • Il tuo contributo sarà ancora più visibile. Questa volta sarà anche indossabile ! creeremo un design unico per la t-shirt edizione limitata, solo 400 pezzi, di vario colore,  per ringraziarvi del supporto sulla piattaforma di crowdfunding. 
80 € - Fan Lunch Level 
  • Supporter Standard Level 
  • Supporter Expert Level 
  • PASSERAI UN PIACEVOLE PRANZO assieme agli ospiti di questa edizione e il presidente dell'associazione !!! ( sabato 13 )
100 € - Fan Lunch Level 2
  • Supporter Standard Level 
  • Supporter Expert Level 
  • PASSERAI UN PIACEVOLE PRANZO assieme agli ospiti di questa edizione e il presidente dell'associazione !!! ( Domenica 14 )
500€  -  Platinum Supporter 
Sei davvero uno dei nostri, la tua partecipazione è davvero sentita,  non solo sarai presente in fiera su tutti i banner ma anche nei materiali pubblicitari cartacei e digitali. 
Il nostro più grande grazie sarà poter realizzare la manifestazione che ci fa battere il cuore e sognare. 

Sappiamo che non tutti potranno contribuire monetariamente, ma vi chiediamo di condividere di guardare di seguire tutto quello che succede sui nostri social, perché anche per voi ci sarà un a sorpresa. 

We’re ATTIVAMENTE,  a non-Profit Cultural Association from Lamezia Terme, a bustling town of creativity in Calabria,  in southern Italy.  We’re a a group of  young people operating both in our  city and in our region by promoting and organising cultural, playful and social events.  This passion brought us together five years ago – and we’re going strong today! 

Introducing our hallmark annual event - Lamezia Comics & Co...

The first  INTERNAZIONAL COMICS and  ANIMATED FILM CONVENTION  in CALABRIA – celebrating its 6th year.

Comics, animated films, games, cosplay, music, workshops, national and international guests:  Lamezia Comics & Co is the perfect  event to  let  young people, illustrators, fans and the overall  curious from southern Italy  meet each other and share their experiences.

Those entering the Lamezia Comics  will  find themselves in an encompassed and interactive environment  – including  the creative arts, comics and games, with a significant degree of professional  attention applied to ensure an authentic experience. Below is a an example of what those attending Lamezia Comics will take with them this year:

•  Culture -  comics, exhibitions, films, concerts, picture book launches, meetings  and discussions with important personalities; incentives for people’s growth, regardless if you’re young or an adult.

•  Collaboration -  games, entertainment, workshops -  promoting an experience like “ being  together like a family” through meeting like-minded people with similar  interests and passions – through the lens of lightheartedness and creativity.

•  Productivity – space for young artists. Not only will they have dedicated space, they find someone who trusts them and provides  them opportunities to  challenge and improve their artistic abilities . They’ll be given the opportunity to enter the working world (commission or sale of their works of art). Our purpose is to welcome and provide space to those entering this fantastic world and experience; our ambition is to provide rising young talent with increased visibility.

It’s important that we don’t  underestimate  that our objective is to support youth and the young at heart alike. Over the past five years, a significant proportion of southern Italian youth attended the event – feeling involved,  able to express themselves and confident to take new challenges.  In particular, the youth from Lamezia see this event as a space for them and the southern Italian community where  everyone is accepted and understood.

The LameziaComics&Co... : “fostering a healthy and vibrant environment of positivity, where young individuals are themselves the main characters.”

It’s through this that the spirit of the Association Attivamente is driven - where  young people in our city and southern Italy commit themselves to plan, create and  participate in our activities. 

LameziaComics&Co  takes place over three days, organised by a number of different activities linked to the world of fantasy. By relating to youth through the world of comics, the event  promotes  integral  cultural and social  values.

Culture and fun at the same time is what the Lamezia Comics&Co offers to the fans of this fantastic world, especially to the younger ones.  

The Lamezia Comics & Co is : “…an innovative and unique initiative in Calabria, a very different initiative from those cultural events already in progress. ”



  • GAMES 
Participants will find various Associations who have organised playful activities such as  board games, collectors playing cards , video games and RPGs. In this section they’ll find  everything that’s new and exciting in the games world.

•  Exhibitions

Here, different exhibitions are set up to not only allow guests to exhibit their works of art, but to also offer a section dedicated to emerging artists. Talented  individuals, including those from outside Calabria will be given the opportunity to showcase their talent and creativity. In conjunction with illustrations and comics,  ample  space will be given to modellism:  scale model landscapes and figures, historical representations, Comic Art recreations  and much more .

 

•  Cinema

This section will show films for all age groups - starting from the early afternoon  until the late evening, a large variety of film styles and genres will be shown.  There will even be space for  new movie releases and ‘must watch’ classics.

•  Stands

In this section visitors will be able to meet all our invited artists. Artists will be on hand to answer questions and inspire others. In addition, comic store owners, libraries and publishers will showcase the latest trends and of course, items will be available for sale.

•  Workshops and meetings

In this section meetings and workshops involving our invited artists  will be organised. Comic schools, illustrators, inkers will share their personal experiences.

•  Live

The Live section is the most eclectic of the event. Different events take place throughout the day, from  medieval combat /armor games, to music concerts of cartoons cover bands. The final day is where the cosplay contest will be held.

Visitors have FREE ENTRANCE – a big difference from other similar events run globally.   

 

10.000,00 €  is what we need  to continue this incredible event and realise our ambitions.

We want LameziaComics&Co to remain available to everyone, whether if children or adults, as we believe  as all cultural events  should be accessible. 

Whilst reading about LameziaComics&Co has been helpful in itself, for those supporting us financially, we have a special programme of recognition offers – to say THANKS! 

5 € - Supporter Beginner Level

A special thank you from the organising team for your generous support in making this event possible

10 € - Supporter Standard Level

You’ll be a main character during the event. A banner with your name/photo will be displayed at the entrance.

15 € - Supporter Expert Level

Saying ‘thank you’ sometimes just isn’t enough: a banner with your name/photo will be displayed at the entrance and your name will be published as a supporter in our official social network media so all our fans can  see you.

25 € - Supporter Master Level

Supporter standard Level + Supporter Expert Level

Your contribution will be even more visible -  you can also wear it! A limited number of 400 specially designed t-shirts with different colours and an original design will be provided to you for your support with our  crowdfunding ambitions.

80 € - Fan Lunch Level

Supporter Standard Level  + Supporter Expert Level

YOU’LL HAVE LUNCH and spend some time together with the invited artists of this VI edition and the president of ATTIVAMENTE !! ( on Saturday 13 )

100 € - Fan Lunch Level 2

Supporter Standard Level  + Supporter Expert Level

YOU’LL HAVE LUNCH and spend some time together with the invited artists  of this VI edition and the president of ATTIVAMENTE !! ( on Sunday 14 )

500€  -  Platinum Supporter

You are one of us!!!  This  event is your event! Your name  will be on all banners in the convention and in all advertising materials both paper and digital. 

We thank you from the bottom of our heart … to make  our ambitions come true! 

We know that not all of you could  contribute financially today, so instead please share what you see and look for updates on what’s happening with our social network.

There will be a surprise also for you!!!!
